content.text: Hi there, I'm a fashion designer who lives in the country.
Hi there, what kind of fashion design do you like?
I love designing formal wear and clothing for special events.
That's awesome! What's your favorite color?
I like wearing purple, but I love to design in all colors.
How many kids do you have?
I have 3 kids, they're the best.
Aww, that's so cute! How old are they?
That's perfect ages! How do you spend time with them?
We go to the park a lot, and we like to go camping.
Camping sounds like so much fun! Do you go hiking too?
Not too much, but we love to go to the beach.
The beach sounds so relaxing. What's your favorite thing to do at the beach?
I love to swim and build sandcastles.
